chinese: 这个峡谷以壮观的景色而闻名
english: this gorge is famous for its spectacular views

chinese: 这张图片展示了植物慢慢地从土壤里发芽的场景
english: this picture shows the plants slow emergence from the soil

chinese: 指纹是证明他是罪犯的决定性证据
english: the fingerprint is conclusive evidence that he is the criminal

chinese: 她超级愤怒，因为她有太多的工作要做
english: she is furious that she has so much work to do

chinese: 面试时，你应当穿着得体
english: you should wear something proper when having an interview

chinese: 这张图显示了中国人口的大致分布
english: this chart shows the approximate population distribution in china

chinese: 他为了博得大家的同情而夸大了事实
english: he is overstating what really happened to gain people's sympathy
the water in the pot is evaporating

chinese: 消费者从超市里买了许多商品
english: the consumers buy many goods from the supermarket

chinese: 用了这款特殊的美白牙膏后，他的牙齿闪闪发光
english: his teeth gleamed after using this special whitening toothpaste
